name: should create a query with player current age
description: Test case for should create a query with player current age
expected_query: with "tb629aad6858c6b940cab57ce9d462487" as (select COALESCE(trg_pid) as pid, SUM(CASE WHEN comp = true THEN recv_yds ELSE 0 END) as rec_yds_from_plays from "nfl_plays" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2020, 2021, 2022, 2023) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by COALESCE(trg_pid)) select "player"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, CASE WHEN player.dob IS NULL OR player.dob = '0000-00-00' THEN NULL ELSE ROUND(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AGE(CURRENT_DATE, TO_DATE(player.dob, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) + (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM AGE(CURRENT_DATE, TO_DATE(player.dob, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) / 12.0) + (EXTRACT(DAY FROM AGE(CURRENT_DATE, TO_DATE(player.dob, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) / 365.25), 2) END as age_0, "tb629aad6858c6b940cab57ce9d462487"."rec_yds_from_plays" AS "rec_yds_from_plays_0", "player"."pos" from "player" left join "tb629aad6858c6b940cab57ce9d462487" on "tb629aad6858c6b940cab57ce9d462487"."pid" = "player"."pid" group by player.fname, player.lname, player.dob, "tb629aad6858c6b940cab57ce9d462487"."rec_yds_from_plays", "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 5 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
